acceptance_criteria.description: Page loads with a name text input, 3 color preset options, and a Generate button visible.
verify: manual: Open index.html in a browser and confirm the name input, 3 color options, and Generate button are visible.

acceptance_criteria.description: Typing a name and clicking Generate displays a styled greeting card on the page.
verify: manual: Type 'Alice' in the name field, select a color, click Generate, and confirm a styled card appears.

acceptance_criteria.description: The greeting card text reads 'Hello, {name}!' where {name} is the entered name.
verify: manual: Type 'Bob' and click Generate. Confirm the card text is exactly 'Hello, Bob!'.

acceptance_criteria.description: The greeting card background color matches the selected preset color.
verify: manual: Select each of the 3 color presets in turn, generate a card, and confirm the card background matches the selection.

acceptance_criteria.description: Changing the name or color and clicking Generate again updates the existing card in place (no duplicates).
verify: manual: Generate a card, then change the name and color, click Generate again, and confirm the card updates without a second card appearing.

acceptance_criteria.description: Submitting an empty or whitespace-only name shows a validation message or safe fallback instead of a broken card.
verify: manual: Leave the name field empty (or enter only spaces), click Generate, and confirm a validation message appears or the card is not generated.

acceptance_criteria.description: Special characters (e.g., '<script>alert(1)</script>') in the name are rendered as plain text, not executed.
verify: manual: Enter '<script>alert(1)</script>' as the name, click Generate, and confirm the text is displayed literally with no script execution.

acceptance_criteria.description: The application works by opening index.html directly in a browser via file:// protocol â€” no server, no build step required.
verify: manual: Double-click index.html to open in default browser. Confirm full functionality without any server or build step.
